item.title: TSP using GA
item.description: Travelling Salesman Problem using Genetic Algorithm This blog post is regarding using genetic algorithm to solve the Travelling Salesman Problem. In a one liner the TSP asks the following question: Given a list of cities and the distances between each pair of the cities, what is the shortest possible route that visits each city and returns to the origin city?” The conditions in this scenario are that no point can be visited twice and it must return to the starting point.
